Articles.Content:
An attempt at a MiG 21 recreation, that performs as close to as possible to the real Mikoyan and Gurevich model 21.

-------------------KB XF-21 ---------------- MiG-21

Length:------------15m approx---------------14.5m

Height:-------------5m approx-----------------4m

Wing span:---------7-8m approx--------------7.1m

Wing area:---------25m^2-------------------23m^2

Weight:------------8.53t---------------------8.82t

Thrust:------------38.8kN-------------------40.21kN

Thurst/Weight:-----0.45----------------------0.45

Service ceiling:----18,000m------------------17,500m

Max speed:--------700m/s-------------------680m/s

Rate of climb:------230m/s-------------------220m/s

Note: it uses an edited engine for most realistic power output, and the mods used are: Procedural wings mod, B9 Aerospace and Mechjeb for stats aquisition.

Please tell me what you think, and leave suggestions for improvements!

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited August 12, 2013 by deskjetser
